charges.charge_disposition: Sentenced to Time Served as to Counts One, Two and Three, with terms to run concurrently. Supervised Release for a term of 3 years as to Counts One, Two and Three, to run concurrently and with six months of home detention. Fine waived. Total SMA $300 ($100 per count)
